thread.title: BRIEF-Silver Spruce Resources Announces Extension Of Private Placement With M Securities Limited

title: BRIEF-Silver Spruce Resources Announces Extension Of Private Placement With M Securities Limited

organizations.name: placement with m securities limited reuters staff  feb

text:
February 9, 2018 / 6:27 PM / in 9 minutes BRIEF-Silver Spruce Resources Announces Extension Of Private Placement With M Securities Limited Reuters Staff 
Feb 9 (Reuters) - Silver Spruce Resources Inc: 
* SILVER SPRUCE RESOURCES INC. ANNOUNCES EXTENSION OF THE PRIVATE PLACEMENT WITH M SECURITIES LIMITED 
* SILVER SPRUCE RESOURCES - ‍ TSX VENTURE EXCHANGE GRANTED EXTENSION TO DEADLINE TO COMPLETE PRIVATE PLACEMENT TO MARCH 9, 2018​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
